meanings.sent1: The old toy lay unmourned in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The lost pen was left unmourned by its owner.
meanings.sent3: The unmourned sandwich in the fridge was eventually thrown away.
meanings.sent4: The unmourned plant withered away in the neglected garden.
meanings.sent5: The unmourned book collected dust on the forgotten shelf.

meanings.sent1: The unmourned painting was sold at a garage sale.
meanings.sent2: The unmourned pet was given to a new loving family.
meanings.sent3: The unmourned leftovers were eagerly eaten by the hungry dog.
meanings.sent4: The unmourned ticket was discarded without a second thought.
meanings.sent5: The unmourned gift was quickly forgotten by the recipient.
